welcome_messages: Hey hey, look who's joined us — welcome aboard, glad to have you here! Settle in, and don't let Trotsky find out!
Big welcome to our newest member — take your time, settle in, make yourself at home! The USSR may be gone, but the CCCP is still around lol!
You made it through — we're happy you're here! Grab a seat and jump in whenever you’re ready, don't wanna keep the babushka's waiting now, do we?
Glad to see you on this side of paradise! You’re in good company now - let the Stalinist terror commence!
Welcome in — no pressure, no rush. Just good people and good conversations ahead (and maybe a few gulags too, but we'll ignore that)!
